snippet.title: Cao Cao - 5th Weapon | Dynasty Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends (4K, 60fps)
snippet.description:
Probably the most overpowered character in this game, that last attack string is so strong it's genuinely disgusting. People say "The new games are too easy" then they obviously haven't played as Cao Cao before.

Difficulty: Very Hard
Stage: Battle of Mt. Ding Jun (Original) - Wei Forces
Requirements: Defeat Huang Zhong in under 5 minutes of the battle starting
Location: On the bend of the hill South West of Huang Zhong's starting location and North West of Liu Bei

Tips: Try not fight him on the hill, because if you do there's a high chance you will get knocked into the Spike Traps and he'll recover health, not to mention moving up the hill is a pain because of the movement speed reduction. Because you are also the commander you only have to defeat Huang Zhong and then Liu Bei, there's no reason to defeat anyone else, especially as you are playing as the best kill machine in the game.
